name: Office Party
description:
Office Party is an experimental game made for fun where you wander around an office party talking to people, learning about the game studio where you work, and chewing out some colleagues. 

Interact with your co-workers to talk to them and make sure to check out the computers around the office to get the latest news headlines and office gossip.

Web GL

Please note that the Web GL build has been tested with Chrome on Windows 10. If you have any trouble with Web GL, please download the Windows standalone executable.

NOTE: For access to the game's menu, use the TAB key in Web GL, Escape causes you lose full screen.

Controls

Office Party uses a standard FPS control scheme and works with either XBOX compatible game pads or keyboard+mouse

Look: Mouse or Right Stick
Move: WASD or Left Stick
Interact: Left Click or X button or Right Trigger
Inspect: Right Click or Y button
Nerd Rage: Middle Mouse or Z key or B button
Toggle Audio: M key
Toggle Menu: Escape key, Tab key, or Start button
Restart Game: R key or Back button
